name: MVC Blog
description: The Model-View-Controller (MVC) is an architectural pattern which separates an application into three main groups of components: Models, Views, and Controllers.
add_details: MVC is abbreviated as Model View Controller is a design pattern created for developing applications specifically web applications.

name: CodeBetter
description: The CodeBetter blog aims to introduce developers to better tools, methodologies, and practices within software development.!
add_details: The blog can definitely be trusted in terms of information as the writers post purely based on their personal experiences and knowledge.

name: Geeks for Geeks
description: An online journal for yearning programming software engineers who want to break interviews at huge tech organizations.
add_details: Geeks for Geeks aims to provide answers to programming/algorithmic inquiries that are normally asked in meetings. It's a client-submitted blog.

name: Web Design Ledger
description: Reading blogs and news sites devoted to your areas of interest allows you to keep apprised of which technologies.
add_details: Provides tutorials and articles on both web development and general design.

name: A List Apart
description: An online journal for yearning programming software developers who want to break interviews.
add_details: covers web development, design, and the business side of web development.
